Author: Theyogithatcould
Text: thank you for taking time out of your life to write something so nice, literally in tears over it. All I can say is thank you and ily :'(

Author: lizsisi
Text: OP I'm so sorry you're feeling this way! I know how shitty it feels; the guy I'm seeing mentioned that his ex "got fat" ONCE, and now I stalk her Instagram constantly so I can compare my body to hers.   I know it's really hard, but try to remind yourself that 10-15 pounds really isn't that much; I'm sure you still look amazing and if he has a problem with that (it doesn't seem like he actually does -- guys can make hurtful offhand comments sometimes but they generally don't mean them or understand how hurtful they are) then he's not worth the trouble.
